page.title: 09LIFE AT GT. WAKERING SCHOOL
page.content: WE COME TO SCHOOL AT 9.00. WHEN THE FIRST WHISTLE GOES THE INFANTS GO IN. WE GO TO ASSEMBLY AT ABOUT 10.00. WE ALL GO TO ASSEMBLY. THE INFANTS GO IN THE SMALL HALL AND THE JUNIORS GO IN THE BIG HALL. AFTER ASSEMBLY WE GO OUT TO PLAY. WHEN WE COME BACK FROM PLAY WE GET ON WITH OUR WORK TILL 12.00 DINNER TIME. YOU CAN HAVE A CHOICE OF BEING HOME DINNERS, SANDWICHES OR SCHOOL DINERS. WE COME IN AT 1.20 P.M. AND HAVE A REGISTER TO SEE IF EVERYONE IS HERE. THEN WE GET ON WITH OUR WORK. ON FRIDAY AFTERNOON WE PLAY ROUNDERS. AN ASSEMBLY IS WHEN WE MEET TOGETHER AND A TEACHER READS US A STORY. AT 3.15 P.M. THE INFANTS GO HOME AND AT 3.25 P.M. THE JUNIORS GO HOME. MY FRIEND I SIT NEXT TO IS CHARLOTTE. THAT IS A SCHOOL DAY.
